recipes.title: Neapolitan Pizza
recipes.description: The most famous pizza in the world, the Neapolitan pizza.
instructions: Dissolve the yeast and salt in some water then mix the flour and water together.
Knead the dough for max 3 minutes. Mix everything together. Let the dough rest for 20 minutes.
Stretch and fold the dough every 20 minutes, repeating 3 times.
Let the dough rest for 12 hours. Divide the dough into 220g balls. And let rest until doubled in size.
Roll out the dough and add the tomato, fiordilatte, pecorino and basil.
Bake the pizza with a wood-fired oven at 430Â°C for 90 seconds.
If you are cooking with a homeoven, bake the pizza at max temperature on a baking steel.

recipes.title: Pasta Carbonara
recipes.description: One of the most famous pasta in the world, the Pasta Carbonara.
instructions: Cook the pasta in boiling salted water.
Fry the guanciale or pancetta in a pan.
Mix the egg, pecorino and black pepper in a bowl.
Drain the pasta and add it to the pan with the guanciale or pancetta.
Add the egg, pecorino and black pepper mixture to the pan.

recipes.title: Tiramisu
recipes.description: The most famous dessert in the world, the Tiramisu.
instructions: Mix the egg yolks and sugar in a bowl.
Add the mascarpone to the bowl and mix everything together.
Dip the ladyfingers in the coffee and place them in a dish.
Add a layer of the mascarpone mixture on top of the ladyfingers.
Repeat the process until you have no more ingredients.
Dust the top with cocoa powder and let it rest in the fridge for at least 4 hours.
